Module eu.steffo.cleaver
Package eu.steffo.cleaver.logic.stream.input

Interface ICleaverInputStream

All Superinterfaces:
ICleaverStream
All Known Implementing Classes:
CleaverCryptInputStream, CleaverDeflateInputStream, CleaverForkFileInputStream, CleaverSimpleFileInputStream, CleaverSplitFileInputStream
public interface ICleaverInputStream
extends ICleaverStream
A ICleaverStream that is also a InputStream (a stream you can read bytes from).
See Also:
StitchJob

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static InputStream fromElement​(Element element, File chpFileDirectory, String password)
    Construct a ICleaverInputStream from a XML tag.

  • Method Details

    • fromElement

      static InputStream fromElement​(Element element, File chpFileDirectory, String password) throws ChpFileError, IOException

      Construct a ICleaverInputStream from a XML tag.

      Based on the input tagName, a different ICleaverInputStream is created:

      • <Crypt> tags create a CleaverCryptInputStream with the salt and iv respectively deserialized from the salt and iv attributes, wrapping the ICleaverInputStream recursively created from its child;
      • <Deflate> tags create a CleaverDeflateInputStream wrapping the ICleaverInputStream recursively created from its child;
      • <Simple> tags create a CleaverSimpleFileInputStream with the File specified in the child <OriginalFile> tag;
      • <Split> tags create a CleaverSplitFileInputStream with the File specified in the child <OriginalFile> tag and the part size specified in the part-size attribute;
      • <Fork>, representing a CleaverForkFileInputStream with the File specified in the child <OriginalFile> tag and the number of parts specified in the parts attribute;
      Parameters:
      element - The XML Element to construct the ICleaverInputStream from.
      chpFileDirectory - The directory in which the *.chp file is located.
      password - The password to use in case <Crypt> tags are present.
      Returns:
      The created ICleaverInputStream.
      Throws:
      ChpFileError - If an unknown tag is encountered.
      IOException - If something goes wrong while opening the streams (missing files, insufficient permissions, ...)
      See Also:
      ChopJob, SaltSerializer
